thread.section_title: eFaucets.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eFaucets.com | www.efaucets.com
thread.title: Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text:
I don't know if I would do business again with eFaucets.com but I did get what was ordered within the delivery window. After I ordered I didn't get a tracking number until I sent an email questioning my order delivery status two days later. The items were shipped out the same day I ordered and packaged appropriately.
An email with the tracking code said "We ask that you open the boxes and inspect the products for any signs of damage, such as broken parts or chips and cracks in the finish, within 48 business hours of delivery." The email same email stated "Concealed Damaged? - You have 3 days to report & Call Us."
The prices are low and free shipping brought me in but the hit or miss service and return policy is what will push me away in the future.
